Name: A Secret
Description: The Lightbeam Fencing restraining the rampaging Ironhoof doesn't seem like Royan tech, which captures your attention...
QuestDesc: The Lightbeam Fencing restraining the rampaging Ironhoof doesn't seem like Royan tech, which captures your attention...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Hmm, definitely the work of an Outcast.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good thing those railings actually held the Ironhoof back.

Options.PlotLineKey: Where did you even get them, Sephira?

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? {PlayerName}? What are you talking about?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The railings. Where did you get them? They look like Outcast weapons.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Didn't think you'd recognize them... Well, you're right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some folks from our village used to be Outcasts. They redeemed themselves later, but these things were left behind. I kept them around just in case, and learned how to use them. Looks like that finally paid off.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Still, people don't change that easily, do they? Just like Dhalifa and this observatory.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Hmm… something about this doesn't sit right. I should check with the others later.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Wounded Villager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, was it you who stopped that Ironhoof? Thank you so much for your help.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello. I heard from Sephira that there used to be Outcasts in your village who left their weapons here. Is that true?

Dialogues.Speaker: Wounded Villager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah… those were rough times. Some people even thought they could sell Exoswarm materials for money, which is why they got kicked out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Wounded Villager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for the weapons you mentioned… I don't know much about them.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those weapons are dangerous to handle. I'll talk to Sephira again.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Something smells fishy. I should stay attentive.)
